copyData(File, File) - Method in class bll.Actions
This method is used when the admin is trying to delete an existing product The old file which contains the old data must be replaced with a new one which contain new data about the deleted product
createBill(Order) - Method in class dal.Writer
The purpose of this method is to generate a bill (.txt format) which contains all details of an order
createComposite(CompositeProduct) - Method in class bll.Actions
The purpose of the method is to create a composite product using Composite Design Pattern from a list of base products, add it into a map, and write it into a file
createComposite(CompositeProduct) - Method in interface bll.IDeliveryServiceProcessing
 
CreateComposite - Class in presentation
This class creates the appropriate interface for an admin when he wants to create a composite product All base products that could be used to create a composite product are showed into a JTable from where the admin can choose the elements by selecting a chechbox
CreateComposite() - Constructor for class presentation.CreateComposite
 
createOrder(String, List<MenuItem>) - Method in class bll.Actions
The purpose of the method is to create an order composed of a name (a hashcode) and a list of items which has been ordered through this order
createOrder(String, List<MenuItem>) - Method in interface bll.IDeliveryServiceProcessing
 
CSearch - Class in presentation
This class creates the appropriate interface for an admin when he wants to search for a product in order to create a composite product All products from the menu are showed into a JTable from where the admin can choose the menuitem, by selecting a chechbox, to order
CSearch() - Constructor for class presentation.CSearch
